entry.title: WIND WARNING , Yarmouth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:56 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yarmouth Airport 10:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 2.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 75 %
Dewpoint: -1.7°C
Wind: E 39 km/h gust 56 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain at times heavy. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain at times heavy beginning this morning except snow inland. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm except snowfall amount 2 cm inland. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 along parts of the coast late this morning and this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Snow inland early this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early in the morning. Showers beginning in the morning then changing to 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Fog patches. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Windy. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
